description:
Back at the Demon Castle, Princess Syalis interrupts an important meeting to share about her haunted dreams.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Der schreckliche Albtraum der Prinzessin und Dämonen
Hime to Mazoku no Osorubeki Akumu
The Princess and the Frightful Demon Nightmare
姫と魔族の恐るべき悪夢
